column1: Uchi////So from the HH menu we got the Uchiviche
column2: Sakana fry and the Machi Cure. GET THE UCHIVICHE. Its this amazing blend of salmon
column3: cilantro and mouth watering sauce. Portion is small
column4: but we were each able to try. The sakana fry
column5: also ordered from the HH menu. GET THE SAKANA FRY. We ordered 2 of those and we were so glad we did. This has a comfortable kick
column7: and a light tempura coating. Machi cure was different
